>>>>> "E" == Eugen Leitl <eugen@leitl.org> writes:

    E> ... Moreover, worms which use email as vector exist *only*
    E> because a single vendor ships mailers with broken default
    E> settings, and insists to make documents executables. This makes
    E> for very bad press, and eventually that vendor is going to wise
    E> up, and stop shipping as many broken wares

Do you suppose any of us will live long enough to see such a day?
